body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Edward Butler and I work for XYZ Hotels. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sandra. Can you please provide me with your room number and the last four digits of the credit card used for your booking?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my room number is two two four five and the last four digits of my credit card are five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Sandra. Can you also let me know the date and time of your scheduled checkout from our hotel?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My checkout is on the twenty-third of October at twelve thirty in the afternoon.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for confirming. We'll make sure to note that down. Is there anything else you need assistance with today, Sandra?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. I'm a bit nervous about my checkout, but I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Sandra. Thank you for reaching out to us. If you have any more questions or concerns, feel free to contact us anytime. Thank you for your time and have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Edward. I appreciate your assistance. Goodbye.
